Make date transformation function

Source: R/fn_make.R
make_date_tfmn_fn.Rd

make_date_tfmn_fn() is a Make function that creates a new R object. Specifically, this function implements an algorithm to make date transformation function. The function returns Date transformation (a function).

Usage

make_date_tfmn_fn(format_1L_chr = "%d-%b-%y")

Arguments

format_1L_chr

Format (a character vector of length one), Default: '%d-%b-%y'

Value

Date transformation (a function)

On this page
